title: Pictures: Hartford Fashion Week
text:
Caption Hartford Fashion Week Mara Lavitt / Special to The Courant Six designers showed their fashions. The full complement of styles from the New Britain sisters designing duo called Saints by S.J.
Six designers showed their fashions. The full complement of styles from the New Britain sisters designing duo called Saints by S.J.
(Mara Lavitt / Special to The Courant) See more galleries Caption Hartford Fashion Week Mara Lavitt / Special to The Courant Attendees Katharine Ortiz of West Hartford, left, and Patricia Baker of Cheshire, right.
Attendees Katharine Ortiz of West Hartford, left, and Patricia Baker of Cheshire, right.
(Mara Lavitt / Special to The Courant) See more galleries The last day of the inaugural Hartford Fashion Week at Union Station.
